author: stsp
msg: [ Note from the future: This commit was reverted in r38584. ]
Revert r37827. Actual testing on OpenBSD shows that the fix didn't work.
This is entirely my bad and I really should have tested this better.
r37827 even ended up being merged to 1.6.x in r37961.
I will try to find a working fix.

author: pburba
msg: On the subtree-mergeinfo branch: Sync merge from trunk, r38505-r38569.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r38556 and with a bit of help from r38304 an attempt
to fix the swig perl bindings on the Windows and x64-Ubuntu buildbots.
Quoting r38304, 'This just fixes compilation, I've no idea whether it
actually makes things work! The core of the problem is that the bindings
are getting confused by our new dual-pool strategy employed in the C code.
We still need to sort that out properly.'
Add scratch_pool as alias for the apr_pool_t *pool rule.

author: stsp
msg: Partly fix issue 1493: Property diffs/merge should use libsvn_diff.
This commit makes 'svn diff' display property diffs generated by libsvn_diff.
It does not implement merging of property values via libsvn_diff, however.
Two tests are marked XFAIL by this commit, they will be fixed soon.
(output_unified_flush_hunk): New parameter for choosing hunk delimiter.
parameters specifying whether a diff header should be generated,
and for choosing the hunk delimiter. Pass the latter parameter down
(display_prop_diffs): Use libsvn_diff for diffing property values.
diff_symlink_to_dir): Update expected output to new property diff format.
new-style prop diffs are implemented in svnlook.
